author: PTI
title: Ivanka lauds OYO offering free stay to US doctors
description: Ivanka lauds OYO offering free stay to US doctorsTrump described OYO's gesture as 'impactful acts of benevolence'.
content: NEW YORK: Ivanka Trump, the senior advisor to President Donald Trump, has lauded an initiative by Ritesh Agarwal-founded Indian start-up OYO Hotels to offer free stays to doctors, nurses in the US helping in the fight against the novel coronavirus, describing… [+6594 chars]
